name.description: The name of the endpoint. The name must be unique across endpoint types. The following names are reserved:  `events`, `operationsMonitoringEvents`, `fileNotifications` and `$default`.

connection_string.description: The connection string for the endpoint.

id.description: The ID of the IoTHub EventHub Endpoint.

create.description: Used when creating the IotHub EventHub Endpoint.

update.description: Used when updating the IotHub EventHub Endpoint.

read.description: Used when retrieving the IotHub EventHub Endpoint.

delete.description: Used when deleting the IotHub EventHub Endpoint.
